translation.title_en: Suspected Grok 4.20 Model Appears on Design Arena
translation.title_ko: ë””ìì¸ ì•„ë ˆë‚˜ì— ê·¸ë¡ 4.20 ì¶”ì • ëª¨ë¸ ë‚˜ì˜´
translation.content_en: It is reported that a new suspected Grok 4.20 model has surfaced, distinct from the one identified a few days ago. While the previous version was not considered SOTA-level (State-of-the-Art), the current model is receiving high praise, with performance reportedly comparable to 'Gemini 3 Pro' or 'Opus 4.5' (speculative versions mentioned in the original source).
